data.title: BATTLEFIELD EARTH 1985 Science Fiction CALENDAR (12 Scenes) By L. Ron Hubbard by Hubbard, L. Ron.: Soft cover (1984) TRUE FIRST EDITION THUS.
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780884041771 - TRUE FIRST EDITION THUS. - Soft cover - Bridge Publishers;, USA - 1984 - **** the OCTOBER Page is MISSING; *** BATTLEFIELD EARTH 1985 Science Fiction CALENDAR (12 of the 13 Scenes = 11 Months & Centerfold) By L. Ron Hubbard *** 12 Color Painted Scenes from the Hubbard Novels; Includes the Birthdates of famous Science Fiction Personalities; **** BATTLEFIELD EARTH Scenes with ARTIST who Painted them includes; "Countdown" by Charles Wildbanks; "Chrissie dreams of Rescue" by Jim Warren; "Battle of Edinburgh" by John N. Stewart, "Jonnie" by Gerry Grace, "the Learning Machine" by Corey Wolf, "Robert the Fox in Africa" by Corey Wolf, "Jonnie preparing for the Final Confrontation" (2 page Centerfold spread) by Charles Wildbanks; "Discovery of the Underground Base" by Peter Heer, "Gold Mine Disaster" by John Stewart, "Insurrection" by Josh Kirby, "Windsplitter" by Jim Warren, "Death of a Tolnep" by Joe Spencer; *** VERY RARE; with ZERO other copies Listed at time of this Listing; **** Overall a nice VERY GOOD example; ON SALE for 1/2 our Regular Price, because the OCTOBER Page is MISSING; (12 of the 13 Painted Scenes are still present); Size: 12-1/2" x 12-1/2" - BATTLEFIELD EARTH 1985 Science Fiction CALENDAR (12 Scenes) By L. Ron Hubbard
data.text:
About this Item

**** the OCTOBER Page is MISSING; *** BATTLEFIELD EARTH 1985 Science Fiction CALENDAR (12 of the 13 Scenes = 11 Months & Centerfold) By L. Ron Hubbard *** 12 Color Painted Scenes from the Hubbard Novels; Includes the Birthdates of famous Science Fiction Personalities; **** BATTLEFIELD EARTH Scenes with ARTIST who Painted them includes; "Countdown" by Charles Wildbanks; "Chrissie dreams of Rescue" by Jim Warren; "Battle of Edinburgh" by John N. Stewart, "Jonnie" by Gerry Grace, "the Learning Machine" by Corey Wolf, "Robert the Fox in Africa" by Corey Wolf, "Jonnie preparing for the Final Confrontation" (2 page Centerfold spread) by Charles Wildbanks; "Discovery of the Underground Base" by Peter Heer, "Gold Mine Disaster" by John Stewart, "Insurrection" by Josh Kirby, "Windsplitter" by Jim Warren, "Death of a Tolnep" by Joe Spencer; *** VERY RARE; with ZERO other copies Listed at time of this Listing; **** Overall a nice VERY GOOD example; ON SALE for 1/2 our Regular Price, because the OCTOBER Page is MISSING; (12 of the 13 Painted Scenes are still present); Size: 12-1/2" x 12-1/2". Seller Inventory # 11132-4
